organizations.name: dallas atlanta minneapolis seattle detroit lexington san diego

text: Dallas, Atlanta, Minneapolis and Seattle to Tokyo Japan for $500 roundtip? Sure, why not... $500 RT - From Dallas to Tokyo (HND) on Delta Airlines, makes 1 stop: DFW-HND: Feb 27; Mar 6, 13, 20, 27; April 10, 17 HND-DFW: Every Mon/Tue/Wed/Thurs beginning Mar 2 thru April 26 $500 RT - From Atlanta to Tokyo on ANA/United Airlines, makes 1 stop: ATL-NRT: Feb 27; Mar 6, 13, 20, 27; April 3, 10, 17, 24 HND-ATL: Every Mon/Tue/Wed/Thurs beginning Mar 2 thru April 27 $500 RT - From Minneapolis to Tokyo on ANA/United Airlines, makes 1 stop: MSP-HND: Every Sun/Mon/Tue beginning Feb 26 thru April 25 HND-MSP: Every Mon/Tue/Wed/Thurs beginning Mar 2 thru April 27 $500 RT - From Seattle to Tokyo on ANA/United Airlines, makes 1 stop: SEA-HND: Feb 27, 28; Every Mon/Tue/Wed/Thurs in March and April except March 21, 23, 28, 29, April 3, 6, 27 HND-SEA: Every Mon/Tue/Wed/Thurs beginning Mar 2 thru April 27 Use those dates and plug into Priceline [ priceline.com ] , Orbitz [ orbitz.com ] , CheapOAir [ cheapoair.com ] or Expedia [ expedia.com ] Sample itineraries attached See Deal Share If you purchase something through a post on our site, Slickdeals may get a small share of the sale.
